teamMembers.name: Rajiv Sharma
teamMembers.bio: With over 25 years in international education, Rajiv founded IOES with a vision to transform overseas education consultancy in India.

teamMembers.name: Priya Patel
teamMembers.bio: Priya oversees all operational aspects of IOES, ensuring seamless service delivery across all our offices.

teamMembers.name: Dr. Anand Verma
teamMembers.bio: A former university professor, Dr. Verma leads our team of academic counselors with his extensive knowledge of global education systems.

teamMembers.name: Meera Kapoor
teamMembers.bio: With a background in immigration law, Meera has helped thousands of students navigate complex visa processes successfully.

teamMembers.name: Vikram Singh
teamMembers.bio: Vikram specializes in helping students secure scholarships and financial aid to make their study abroad dreams affordable.

teamMembers.name: Neha Gupta
teamMembers.bio: Neha maintains our partnerships with universities worldwide, staying updated on admission requirements and new programs.
